title: The Ant and the dove
creator_credit: Gakken Company and Coronet Instructional Films
brief_description: One good turn deserves another is the moral of this fable by Aesop. This charming tale of an ant who, despite his small size, is able to save the life of his friend, the dove, will stimulate and delight young children.
description: One good turn deserves another is the moral of this fable by Aesop. This charming tale of an ant who, despite his small size, is able to save the life of his friend, the dove, will stimulate and delight young children.
